meanings.definition: A person or thing that removes hair.
meanings.sent1: My friend is skilled at using depilators to remove unwanted hair.
meanings.sent2: The depilators in the salon are very effective at hair removal.
meanings.sent3: The depilators at the spa work tirelessly to keep everyone smooth and hair-free.
meanings.sent4: Her depilators were like tiny warriors, battling against the hair growth.
meanings.sent5: The depilators hummed softly as they worked their magic, leaving behind smooth skin.

meanings.definition: A device used for removing hair.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new set of depilators to use at home.
meanings.sent2: The depilators on the market vary in terms of effectiveness and price.
meanings.sent3: The depilators on the infomercial promised quick and painless hair removal.
meanings.sent4: Her depilators gleamed under the bright lights of the store display.
meanings.sent5: The depilators buzzed softly as they worked their magic on the customer's legs.
